title: Melody no Jikenbo: Rose Garden de Ochakai wo
original_name: メロディの事件簿 薔薇咲くお庭で<ローズガーデン>お茶会を
sinopse:
Despite being from different social classes, Lady Melody is finally wed to her butler Alfred. They move to a new home in the countryside of Great Britain. What kind of happy newlywed life awaits them with their new neighbors?

(Source: Shogakukan, translated)
